name: LIMERENCE (catsket)
description:
WARNING: THIS EXPERIENCE CONTAINS THEMES OF VIOLENCE, KIDNAPPING, SUICIDE, AND OBSESSION. PLEASE PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK.

lim·er·ence

/ˈlimərəns/

the state of being infatuated or obsessed with another person, typically experienced involuntarily and characterized by a strong desire for reciprocation of one's feelings but not primarily for a sexual relationship.

-

a short story of a captive and a captor chatting over dinner. not so much horror but more a tense, uneasy atmosphere and an imbalance of power.  named after the yves tumor song of the same name, part of the art without blood universe, but you aren't required to play the [currently] demo to understand this game. based on an unpublished set of poems.

made for the O2A2 jam.

contains:

  • 977 words
  • one choice
  • one bastard who won't stop staring at you

music is by makoto hiramatsu under CC BY 4.0
